verses.text: Save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, God, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* waters \w have|strong="H1732"\w* come \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* neck!

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* sink \w in|strong="H5315"\w* deep mire, where \w there|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* no foothold. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* come \w into|strong="H4325"\w* deep \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, where \w the|strong="H3588"\w* floods overflow \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.
I am weary \w with|strong="H4325"\w* my crying. My throat \w is|strong="H4325"\w* dry. My eyes fail looking \w for|strong="H4325"\w* my God.

Those \w who|strong="H7121"\w* hate \w me|strong="H7121"\w* without \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cause|strong="H7121"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* more than \w the|strong="H7121"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* head. Those \w who|strong="H7121"\w* want \w to|strong="H7121"\w* cut \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w off|strong="H3615"\w*, being \w my|strong="H3615"\w* enemies wrongfully, \w are|strong="H5869"\w* mighty. \w I|strong="H5869"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* restore what \w I|strong="H5869"\w* didn’t take \w away|strong="H3615"\w*.
\w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w you|strong="H7725"\w* know \w my|strong="H7725"\w* foolishness. \w My|strong="H7725"\w* sins aren’t hidden \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*.

Don’t \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H3045"\w* wait \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* shamed \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, Lord \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w Armies|strong="H3808"\w*. Don’t \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H3045"\w* \w seek|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* brought \w to|strong="H3045"\w* dishonor \w through|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Israel.

Because \w for|strong="H6960"\w* \w your|strong="H1245"\w* sake, \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* borne \w reproach|strong="H3637"\w*. \w Shame|strong="H3637"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* covered \w my|strong="H1245"\w* face.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w become|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stranger \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* brothers, \w an|strong="H5375"\w* alien \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mother’s children.

\w For|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* zeal \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* house consumes \w me|strong="H1961"\w*. \w The|strong="H1961"\w* reproaches \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w those|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* reproach \w you|strong="H2114"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w fallen|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* wept \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* fasted, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* sackcloth \w my|strong="H1961"\w* clothing, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* byword \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Those|strong="H1992"\w* \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w sit|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* gate talk \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* song \w of|strong="H4912"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* drunkards.

But \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* me, \w my|strong="H8354"\w* prayer \w is|strong="H8179"\w* \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H3427"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w an|strong="H3427"\w* acceptable time. God, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H8354"\w* loving kindness, answer me \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* truth \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H8354"\w* salvation.

Deliver \w me|strong="H6030"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* mire, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* don’t \w let|strong="H6256"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* sink. \w Let|strong="H6256"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* hate \w me|strong="H6030"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* deep waters.

Don’t let \w the|strong="H5337"\w* \w flood|strong="H4325"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* overwhelm \w me|strong="H8130"\w*, \w neither|strong="H5337"\w* let \w the|strong="H5337"\w* \w deep|strong="H4615"\w* swallow \w me|strong="H8130"\w* up. Don’t let \w the|strong="H5337"\w* pit shut its mouth \w on|strong="H4325"\w* \w me|strong="H8130"\w*.

Answer \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* loving kindness \w is|strong="H6310"\w* good. \w According|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* tender mercies, turn \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Don’t hide \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6437"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* servant, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* distress. \w Answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* speedily!

Draw \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* soul \w and|strong="H6030"\w* redeem \w it|strong="H3588"\w*. Ransom \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6887"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5315"\w* know \w my|strong="H6299"\w* reproach, \w my|strong="H6299"\w* shame, \w and|strong="H7126"\w* \w my|strong="H6299"\w* dishonor. \w My|strong="H6299"\w* adversaries \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w all|strong="H1350"\w* before \w you|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w has|strong="H3045"\w* broken \w my|strong="H3605"\w* heart, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* am \w full|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* heaviness. \w I|strong="H3045"\w* looked \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w some|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w take|strong="H3045"\w* pity, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w*; \w for|strong="H3605"\w* comforters, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w found|strong="H3045"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w also|strong="H3820"\w* gave \w me|strong="H4672"\w* poison \w for|strong="H6960"\w* \w my|strong="H4672"\w* food. \w In|strong="H4672"\w* \w my|strong="H4672"\w* thirst, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* gave \w me|strong="H4672"\w* vinegar \w to|strong="H3820"\w* drink.

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* table before \w them|strong="H5414"\w* become \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snare. \w May|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* become \w a|strong="H3068"\w* retribution \w and|strong="H7219"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trap.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* eyes \w be|strong="H1961"\w* darkened, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* can’t see. \w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* backs \w be|strong="H1961"\w* continually bent.

Pour \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* indignation \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*. Let \w the|strong="H7200"\w* fierceness \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* anger overtake \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.
Let \w their|strong="H5921"\w* habitation \w be|strong="H2195"\w* desolate. Let \w no|strong="H8210"\w* one dwell \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* tents.

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* they persecute \w him|strong="H1961"\w* whom \w you|strong="H8074"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* wounded. They tell \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* sorrow \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* whom \w you|strong="H8074"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* hurt.
Charge \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H2491"\w* crime upon crime. Don’t let \w them|strong="H5221"\w* come into \w your|strong="H3588"\w* righteousness.

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* blotted \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* book \w of|strong="H5921"\w* life, \w and|strong="H6666"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* written \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6666"\w*.
\w But|strong="H6662"\w* I am \w in|strong="H3789"\w* pain \w and|strong="H6662"\w* distress. Let \w your|strong="H5973"\w* salvation, God, protect \w me|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3444"\w* \w will|strong="H3444"\w* praise \w the|strong="H7682"\w* name \w of|strong="H3444"\w* God \w with|strong="H6041"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* song, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w will|strong="H3444"\w* magnify \w him|strong="H7682"\w* \w with|strong="H6041"\w* thanksgiving.
\w It|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* please \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* better than an ox, or \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bull that has horns \w and|strong="H8034"\w* hoofs.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* humble \w have|strong="H3068"\w* seen \w it|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w glad|strong="H3190"\w*. \w You|strong="H3190"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek after \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* heart live.
\w For|strong="H2421"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* hears \w the|strong="H7200"\w* needy, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* doesn’t despise \w his|strong="H7200"\w* captive \w people|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w*; \w the|strong="H8085"\w* seas, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* everything \w that|strong="H3588"\w* moves therein!

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* save Zion, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* build \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cities \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Judah. \w They|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H8064"\w* settle \w there|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* own \w it|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1129"\w* \w also|strong="H3063"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w servants|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Those|strong="H3427"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* love \w his|strong="H3588"\w* name \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w therein|strong="H8033"\w*.
